message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000. It's a great deal for both of us, as it's worth $12,000 to you and I'm sure we can find a middle ground. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at this price?

Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but $10,500 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $11,500.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's meet in the middle and finalize this deal.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $11,500, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $11,000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at this price?
